text: Peace is an album recorded by composer and vibraphonist Walt Dickerson in 1975 for the SteepleChase label.SteepleChase Records discography accessed March 16, 2015Fitzgerald, M., Walt Dickerson discography accessed March 27, 2015 ==Reception== Allmusic gave the album 3 stars.Allmusic listing accessed March 30, 2015 ==Track listing== All compositions by Walt Dickerson. # "Universal Peace" – 17:47 # "Chant of Peace" – 28:10 # "Warm Up" – 3:18 Bonus track on CD reissue == Personnel == *Walt Dickerson – vibraphone *Lisle Atkinson – bass *Andrew Cyrille – drums == References == Category:1976 albums Category:Walt Dickerson albums Category:SteepleChase Records albums
title: Peace (Walt Dickerson album)
